Class NIModelSA

java.lang.Object
heparansulfate.NIModelSA
public class NIModelSA extends Object
Fitting of N&I model parameters with heparinase digest constraints via simulated annealing

  • Constructor Summary

    Fitting of N&I model parameters with heparinase digest constraints via simulated annealing; special constructor which adds constraints

  • Constructor Details

    • NIModelSA

      public NIModelSA(int n, BBSet bbs, String[] specFile, String[] consFile, String[] outFile, String modFile, double[][] zeta, int[] pos, Random rand)
      Fitting of N&I model parameters with heparinase digest constraints via simulated annealing; special constructor which adds constraints
      Parameters:
      n - BKHS chain length
      bbs - disachharides and their overall proportions
      specFile - cleavage specificities/yields
      consFile - constraints (experimental fragment length distributions)
      outFile - output file for modeled fragment length distributions
      modFile - output file for optimized matrix Gamma of N&I model
      zeta - specified compositions at positions in pos (additional constraints)
      pos - positions at which composition is further specified (additional constraints)
      rand - random number generator

    • NIModelSA

      public NIModelSA(int n, BBSet bbs, String[] specFile, String[] consFile, String[] outFile, String modFile, Random rand)
      Fitting of parameters of a N&I model with heparinase digest constraints via simulated annealing
      Parameters:
      n - BKHS chain length
      bbs - disachharides and their overall proportions
      specFile - cleavage specificities/yields
      consFile - constraints (experimental fragment length distributions)
      outFile - output file for modeled fragment length distributions
      modFile - output file for optimized matrix Gamma of N&I model
      rand - random number generator

      public static void withoutREC(String inDir, String outDir)
      fits N&I model without added constraint at the reducing end; for supplementary material
      Parameters:
      inDir - input directory (ends with "/")
      outDir - output directory (ends with "/")
